thread.title: Leak Reveals Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date and New Pokémon Gen 10 in Development
thread.title_full: Leak Reveals Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date and New Pokémon Gen 10 in Development

author: world today news
title: Leak Reveals Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date and New Pokémon Gen 10 in Development
text:
 door Editing
 published on Thursday October 17, 2024 about 21:17 •
 2 I read
In short A new generation of codenamed Pokémon Gen 10 is in development. The Nintendo Switch 2 , with code Once may be released at the end of 2024. A major data breach at Game Freak , the developer behind the Pokémon series, has revealed details about the Nintendo Switch 2. That reports Indy 100 . Leaked information indicates that a new generation is currently in existence Pokémon is being developed and that this game should be released for the Nintendo Switch 2 at the end of 2024.
Nintendo Switch 2 Although this news has not yet been confirmed, Nintendo previously announced that they are expecting it by March 2025 details on the Switch 2 successor to be revealed. While there have been no official updates since its announcement in May, recent reports from Blade, a video game accessory company, claim that the console is “finished” and “ready,” with launched in March or April next year. . However, if we can believe the leak, that could be a bit earlier as well.
Game Freak has acknowledged the data breach in an official statement, in which they sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and concern they have caused.
